channel.title: CVE Feed for AddonMaster -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AddonMaster -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-24704|2024-06-11T14:22:32.821Z -- addonmaster -- load%20more%20anything
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in AddonMaster Load More Anything.This issue affects Load More Anything: from n/a through 3.3.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-34390|2024-05-06T18:21:56.842Z -- addonmaster -- post%20grid%20master
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in AddonMaster Post Grid Master allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Post Grid Master: from n/a through 3.4.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-34372|2024-06-04T17:42:03.872Z -- addonmaster -- post%20grid%20master
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in AddonMaster Post Grid Master.This issue affects Post Grid Master: from n/a through 3.4.7.
